text: Viva Zapata! is a 1952 biographical drama movie. It was directed by Elia Kazan. Actors include Marlon Brando, Jean Peters, Anthony Quinn, Joseph Wiseman, and Alan Reed. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won one at the Academy Awards in 1953. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Elia Kazan
title: Viva Zapata!
